author: Elv
name: ElvUI
small_desc: A user interface designed around user-friendliness with extra features that are not included in the standard UI.
desc:
## About

**ElvUI** is a full user interface replacement for World of Warcraft, which means it completely replaces the Blizzard default UI.

## Modules

- **General** [e.g. Fonts, Textures, BlizzUI Improvements such as Loot Roll and Chat Bubbles]
- **ActionBars** [Player, Pet, Stances, Micro Menu, Extra Action Buttons]
- **Bags** [Inventory, Bank, Auto Sell Junk, Sorting]
- **Auras** [Buffs and Debuffs next to your Minimap]
- **Chat** [Clickable URLs, Keyword Alerts, Colors]
- **Cooldown Text** [HH:MM Thresholds, MM:SS Thresholds, Colors]
- **DataBars** [Experience, Reputation, Honor, Azerite, Threat, Classic Pet Experience]
- **DataTexts** [Hundreds of texts to display such as FPS, MS, Durability, Specialization]
- **Maps** [Worldmap, Minimap, Minimap Buttons, Custom DropDown Tracking Menu]
- **NamePlates** [Threat, Player, Enemy NPC, Enemy Player, Friendly NPC, Friendly Player]
- **Tooltip** [Class coloring, Health Bar, Guild Ranks, Current Mount]
- **UnitFrames** [Player, Pet, Target, Focus, Party, Raid and more]
- **Filters** [Custom Allowlists and Blocklists based on spell ids]
- **Aura Highlights** [Color your frames if a specific Buff/Debuff is applied]

## Skins

- **ElvUI** offers custom skins for **all** Blizzard frames across the UI
- A clean and consistent dark mode with custom tab placements
- *(Optional)* Remove Blizzards parchment for a transparent background

## Profiles

- ElvUI profile sharing is very popular on Discord and Wago
- Grab someones profile or upload your own edit
